column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday March 12 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S near Exit 99 (Old Richmond Rd):
column4: The exit ramp is shut down until further notice due to a garbage truck with trailer that overturned on the ramp.
